title: Fix the chat input border radius

body:
## Describe your changes

The radius of the chat input border (only used in SiS) is currently broken: 

![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/bcf92c25-0abb-4c30-9eb7-454ca6d6bb4d)

## Testing Plan

- We are not yet testing the advanced theming option of SIS. This is something planned as follow up of the advanced theming project, but will need a bit more effort to get proper tests set-up.

---

**Contribution License Agreement**

By submitting this pull request you agree that all contributions to this project are made under the Apache 2.0 license.
Ah is this an issue with baseweb requiring long-hand format props?

> Ah is this an issue with baseweb requiring long-hand format props?

Yep, a very annoying aspect of baseweb :(
